title: "Explainer: New Artificial Intelligence rules adopted by the EU"
excerpt: "MEPs have backed new rules governing the use of Artificial Intelligence. The Artificial Intelligence Act includes measures to ban applications that threaten citizens' rights. The European Parliament heard the rules would ensure safety and compliance with fundamental rights while boosting innovation."
